title: Online Bank (Flask)
description: A simple online banking system built with Flask. Features include QR code payments, fund transfers, and basic banking operations.

title: Hospital Management System (C++)
description: Developed a C++ program for a Hospital Management System, managing patient records, appointments, and treatment details with efficient data handling and user interface.

title: Simple CLI Diary (Python)
description: Developed a Python-based command-line diary app with SQLite for secure logging and efficient data retrieval of daily entries.
